definition: to have all one's wishes (idiom)/best wishes/all the best/may all your hopes be fulfilled
surname Wan
ten thousand/a great number
see 万俟[Mo4 qi2]
matter/thing/item/work/affair/CL:件[jian4],樁|桩[zhuang1],回[hui2]
as/as if/such as
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
idea/meaning/thought/to think/wish/desire/intention/to expect/to anticipate

sentences.english: I wish you all the very best for the new year ahead.
sentences.chinese: 我祝你们在新的一年万事如意。

sentences.english: To conclude, I wish you every success in your work, happiness for you and your families, and good luck in everything.
sentences.chinese: 最后，祝大家工作顺利，阖家幸福，万事如意。

sentences.english: May the New Year bring you health, happiness and all other good things.
sentences.chinese: 祝您新春快乐，身体健康，万事如意。

sentences.english: I bless her everythings all fine!
All the best , " called the other typists in chorus."
sentences.chinese: “祝万事如意，”其他打字员齐声喊道。

sentences.english: Wishing you a Merry Christmas and allgood things for the New Year.
sentences.chinese: 祝你圣诞快乐，新年万事如意。

sentences.english: At last, In the coming new year , wish all the members good health and happiness!
sentences.chinese: 最后，祝大家在新的一年里，阖家欢乐，万事如意。

sentences.english: May its blessings lead into a wonderful year for you and all whom you love.
sentences.chinese: 祝福你及你所爱的人新的一年中万事如意。

sentences.english: A beautiful wish to you and your family --- live a happy life and I hope everything goes well.
sentences.chinese: 祝您和您的家人生活美满万事如意。

sentences.english: But, as the saying goes, you can't always get what you want.
sentences.chinese: 不过，俗话说，你不可能万事如意吧。

sentences.english: Things go better with Taihu honey peach.
sentences.chinese: 吃了太湖牌水蜜桃，万事如意。

sentences.english: Smooth work, family happiness and everythings success.
sentences.chinese: 任务顺利，阖家幸福，万事如意。

definition: to have one's wishes come true/wish you the best!
profits pouring in from all sides (idiom)/raking in money/bonanza
to congratulate respectfully/to wish good luck and success (esp. to a superior)/with best wishes (in writing)
everything is going smoothly (idiom)
Happy New Year!
to wish
May you have a prosperous New Year! (New Year's greeting)
surname Zhu
to wish/to express good wishes/to pray/(old) wizard
good luck
lit. peace when you come or go/peace wherever you go
lit. (may the) five blessings descend upon this home (namely: longevity, wealth, health, virtue, and a natural death)/(an auspicious saying for the Lunar New Year)
to offer humbly (written at the end of letter from sb of lower status to higher status)/your humble servant
to climb step by step/to rise steadily/on the up and up
great luck, great profit (idiom); everything is thriving
to be successful in one's studies/academic success
May you have peace year after year (New Year's greeting)
